mapper.insert: insert into cart(id, num, volume) values(#{id},#{num},#{volume})
mapper.select: select cs.*,p.imag from (select c.*,s.type,s.name,s.scale,s.color,s.price,s.ownernumber,s.comp,s.subname from (select * from cart where id='master') c left join stock s on c.num = s.no) cs left join product p on cs.ownernumber = p.ownernumber
select count(*) from cart where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update cart set volume=(select volume from cart where num=#{num})+#{volume} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select d.*,c.no,c.name,c.discount,c.enddate from detail d left outer join coupon c on d.id = c.id where d.id=#(id)
